mapper.insert: insert into NOTICE(NOTICE_NUM, ADMIN_ID, NOTICE_TYPE, NOTICE_SUBJECT, NOTICE_CONTENT, NOTICE_DATE, NOTICE_READCOUNT, NOTICE_IMAGE) values (#{num}, #{id}, #{type}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{date}, #{readcount}, #{image})
mapper.select: select NOTICE_NUM as "num", NOTICE_TYPE as "type", NOTICE_SUBJECT as "subject", NOTICE_DATE as "date", NOTICE_READCOUNT as "readcount" from NOTICE where NOTICE_NUM = #{num}
